评论详情: Got this for my step daughter for Christmas.  Quality of shirt is great! She was so excited when she saw it!

I needed a revamp of my Rapunzel costume, as the sizing was awful. I’ll probably be wearing this with leggings in the future. This week, however, it will be worn with the costume skirt for our school’s favorite storybook character parade. (I’m the Art Teacher; of course I love Rapunzel!)
Got this shirt for my daughter for her birthday.  It fit well and was long enough to not ride up.  She really liked it and was happy with it.
This shirt was perfect for my Disney bounding outfit - I went as Rapunzel! Paired it with purple leggings and my handmade Pascal.
Wore it for a dress up day at work and it worked perfectly! Came in time. I typically wear a L/XL and got a L so it would be here in time, it was a bit snug but still fit fine
I loved this shirt just ordered the wrong size it definitely was big . The fabric is stretchy and thin . Would order it again if I got the right size

At first I was a little apprehensive about the shirt because the sun on it was glittery and I did not realize that from the picture, but it washed up great. No glitter on other clothes in the load and none lost on the shirt. Shirt fabric was also very soft and stretchy.
This shirt is adorable. I love the glitter and it is so comfortable and stretchy. True to size.
I love this shirt. It’s really cute, fits well, and is comfortable
Soft, comfy, great color shirt! The sun is embroidered as well. Perfect option for a subtle Disney shirt in the parks! I did wash once so far and haven’t noticed it shrinking.
Very glittery and bright but didn't flake off or get ruined when washed. Fits true to size im 5'3 flucutate between 120-128lbs 36 D casual fit I don't like tight so it was great
I returned this shirt.The shirt material is very soft , but I didn’t like how stiff the flower was
This if the softest Disney T-shirt that I own. Perfect to wear at any Disney event.
This cute shirt was perfect for my Disney bound outfit! Shirt is a decent quality and the color was exactly as pictured. Lose enough to cover my belly and booty with leggings.

评论概述: I didn't order a crop top.
评论详情: The length of the shirt looks nothing like the picture. It looks like it is missing the bottom third of the shirt. It's totally disproportionate. Returned immediately.
Daughter had a Repunzel birthday so I had to get something to wear to go with theme fit great
I was not impressed with the material of shirt.

I’m usually a medium, but got a large  for oversize look. Fit is good, but I don’t like the fabric. I assumed it would be cotton (I didn’t read the description) but it’s 95% polyester and 5% spamdex (typo and all). I’ll probably return.

This shirt runs a little small and is really short (though not a crop top). I thought it was an average tee shirt length but it’s short. I won’t be able to wear it as I hoped. The embroidered part is really pretty though.
I love that it's so soft an it's so lite . Also love the design doesn't feel like its gonna fall of when washing. It's gonna be perfect for Disney World In October. Can't wait
Soft

评论概述: The fabric makes the fit terrible
评论详情: This shirt is made of a thin, stretchy polyester which clung in all the wrong places and basically accentuated anywhere I had extra “fluff”. I loved the design on it and the color so I even ordered a side up hoping I could make it work, but no. There’s something about the way it’s cut as well to make the fit as awful as it is. I returned both sizes.
Sparkles do get everywhere but it is cute for Disney!
High quality fabric and embroidery. Fits true to size.
bought this shirt for Disney and loved the fact that it was unique. It is soft and very cute fit.
Cute shirt and seemed good quality but fits weird and is short.
Fits well, soft, nice simple design
I ordered this last minute and it didn’t disappoint. The style was perfect, and shirt quality was great. I’ve washed it a few times since first wearing it and still looks the same.

I got this shirt for disneyland and loves the simple reference to tangled. I didn't feel like the sparkles were too much and they stayed in place for me. It does run a little looser than I'd like but still a good fit.
I bought this shirt for my 11 year old granddaughter for Easter. She said that the shirt looks good on her and that she already wore it. Waiting for a picture..
You can see through the material a bit. It's a bit snug as well. The sun is sparkly.
Shipping was delayed a long time, and then when I got the shirt it was a funny feeling material. Not quite active wear but not a regular T-shirt either. 🤷🏼‍♀️
This shirt is very cute - just as pictured.  It is very comfortable.  I am 5'3" 145lbs and I ordered a Medium which fit great.
I just received this today! It was so soft and beautiful upon opening!
Wore this shirt to Disney. Very soft and comfy. True to size.
My daughter wore this to Disneyland to complete her Rapunzel look. Soft fabric, perfect color, good fit.
Good quality shirt and very cute design. Holds up well in the wash too.

Wore this in Disney as well as to a party to match my toddler rapunzel. The decal is a bit thick so if you have sensory issues you may not enjoy wearing this. I normally wear unisex medium, women’s fit large and this fit as expected. tshirt material itself is breathable but not thin and see through.
My friend loved this as a gift. It was for her birthday/Disney trip and she loved it.
Really love the material and how soft/stretchy it is! A little bit of sparkles come off when you rub which is expected with something like this but nothing noticeable.
La tela es buena, se siente muy agusto, es fácil de lavar y no se encoge. El bordado del sol está muy bonito y el color es igual que el de la imagen. Me gustó mucho!
Love this shirt. Fit right. So cute!
My daughter loves this shirt. Very light fabric
Soft fabric. Nicely embroidered design

评论概述: Great quality, perfect for Disney trip!
评论详情: Good quality, soft tee.

We were prepping for a Disneyland trip, and one of my girls wanted to Disney bound as Rapunzel, so when we found this shirt, we had to get it. The color on the shirt is so soft and pretty, and the sun is crisply outlined, and the glitter doesn’t come off at all.  I love the way she looks in this shirt… it’s both laid back and crisp at the same time.

This shirt looks like the picture generally in color and graphics but the fit of the tee I received is very boxy and unflattering. It is made of an athletic, shiny material and hangs short rather than long.
Great shirt
Pretty top that is soft and nice quality
